name: Balchem Corporation
description: Balchem Corporation is a global leader in the development, manufacturing, and marketing of specialty ingredients and innovative solutions for the food, nutrition, and pharmaceutical industries. Founded in 1967, Balchem has established a strong reputation for its commitment to quality, customer service, and continuous innovation. The company operates through three main segments: Human Nutrition & Health, Animal Nutrition & Health, and Industrial Products. With a broad portfolio of products including encapsulated nutrients, food additives, and pharmaceutical intermediates, Balchem serves a diverse range of applications. The company's innovative encapsulation technology is particularly noteworthy, enabling the delivery of active ingredients in a stable and effective manner. Balchem's mission is to improve the health and well-being of people and animals around the world while also enhancing product performance through its advanced technologies. The company operates multiple manufacturing facilities, ensuring high-quality production capabilities and adherence to stringent safety standards. In addition to its strong focus on research and development, Balchem is dedicated to sustainability and responsible sourcing practices. As the demand for health and wellness products continues to grow, Balchem is well-positioned to leverage its expertise and expand its market presence globally.
